RelatedSentence: - Huntsville police said a woman riding a motorcycle was killed on south Memorial Parkway Monday morning .
- Huntsville police said a woman riding a motorcycle was killed on south Memorial Parkway Monday morning .
Police identified the victim as Christina Renee Brazier , 23 , of Huntsville .
The wreck happened northbound near the Vermont Road overpass around 9:15 a.m. Police said Brazier apparently lost control of the motorcycle and struck the inside barrier and a light pole .

Traffic was routed to the access road off the overpass for about an hour while police worked on the scene .
